main event: Two white and bright trailing lights were observed in the sky over Punk City, Texas in October 1956.
interesting points: The objects emitted bright flashes followed by a trailing light,The sighting lasted for five seconds,The objects were observed above 20,000 feet,The direction of the objects was from North to South,The evaluation suggested that the sighting was likely caused by meteors.
witness description: a civilian observer, specifically a captain of a United Airlines flight
